name: FirstAid
0:
”Alexa, Open Red Cross First Aid”
”Alexa, ask Red Cross First Aid how do I perform CPR?”
”Alexa, ask Red Cross First Aid how do I treat burns”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: red cross first aid
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The official American Red Cross First Aid action provides expert education for common first aid emergencies. Enable the action and have lifesaving information at your fingertips. Don’t forget to test your knowledge by taking our quizzes! 
 
Disclaimer: By using this skill, you agree to the terms of the medical disclaimer below. 

NOTHING ON THIS SKILL SHOULD BE CONSTRUED AS AN ATTEMPT TO OFFER OR RENDER A MEDICAL OPINION OR OTHERWISE ENGAGE IN THE PRACTICE OF MEDICINE. THE RED CROSS DOES NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE OR DIAGNOSIS. THE SKILL WAS DESIGNED FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY AND NOT FOR THE PURPOSE OF RENDERING MEDICAL ADVICE. THE INFORMATION IN THIS SKILL DOES NOT CREATE A PHYSICIAN-PATIENT RELATIONSHIP AND IS NOT INTENDED TO REPLACE THE COUNSEL OF YOUR PHYSICIAN. IF YOU HAVE ANY SPECIFIC QUESTIONS ABOUT ANY MEDICAL MATTER, YOU SHOULD CONSULT YOUR DOCTOR OR OTHER HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL.
priv:
